Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= action by which married humans have voluntary sexual intercourse with other humans who are not their spouse; ≈ often used as a metaphor for treachery or idolatry
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
= cake; ◄ made of dried, compressed grapes; ► possibly eaten at festivals and other special ceremonies
= action by which humans acquire for themselves the temporary or permanent service or use of a person or object ◄ by means of a financial transaction or in another way
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= unit of measure of 220 liters or 6 bushels; equals 10 ephah (אֵיפָה) and 100 omer (עֹמֶר)

= a type of cultivated grass like wheat or rice; less than 1 m tall; it produces a single head on each stalk, with rows of kernels; ◄ Hordeum distichum or Hordeum vulgare; ► its grain was used to make bread or beer, or for animal feed
= unit of dry measure of 110 liters or 3 bushels; equals 5 ephahs and 50 omers

= a type of cultivated grass like wheat or rice; less than 1 m tall; it produces a single head on each stalk, with rows of kernels; ◄ Hordeum distichum or Hordeum vulgare; ► its grain was used to make bread or beer, or for animal feed

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time

Node.gloss: to prostitute oneself|to play the prostitute
Node.definition: = action by which humans engage in prostitution; ≈ associated with unfaithfulness

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= a column ◄ that was usually made of a single stone; with or without inscriptions, ► as an attribute relating to non sanctioned worship, usually found on a high place (בָּמָה)

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

= embroidered garment; reaching from the shoulders to the waist; ◄ made from linen; ► worn by the high priest (כֹּהֵן) over his robe (מְעִיל) representing the visible glory of God; associated with divine oracles as the urim and tummim were kept in a pouch worn on top of it; this garment was regarded as unique and not to be duplicated and used outside of regulated worship
= a small and portable physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing, ► functioning as an object of non sanctioned worship or divination
= referent to the time after the event in focus
literally: to turn; hence: = process by which humans or deities change their mind about a certain matter, ► which usually results in a different course of action
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= objects that are considered of a good quality and attractive to the eye
= pertaining to being the last part of an event, close to its moment of completion
literally: end of days; hence: = a period of time in the future
